CQ1.query: Find the longest track name and its duration for each album of the artist 'The Beatles'.
CQ1.sql: SELECT MAX(tracks.milliseconds), tracks.name FROM tracks JOIN albums ON tracks.album_title = albums.title WHERE albums.artist_name = 'The Beatles' GROUP BY tracks.album_title;

CQ2.query: Show the average track price for each artist.
CQ2.sql: SELECT albums.artist_name, AVG(tracks.unit_price) FROM tracks JOIN albums ON tracks.album_title = albums.title GROUP BY albums.artist_name;
